name: Power Sand Bags - FREE DELIVERY
description:
RAWFIT Power Sand Bags come in three different sizes: 
Small - holds maximum weight of upto 15kg 
Medium - holds maximum weight of upto 30kg
Large - holds maximum weight of upto 45kg 
 
*Ultimate Sandbag Training made with 1000 Denier Nylon
*Sandbag training will increase the effectiveness of a whole range of exercises.
*Comes with 3 inner fillers made with the same material as the outer bag and double Velcro.
*Rubber handles to make lifts a little more comfortable.
*Sand not included. We recommend play sand.

Sand Bags will increase the challenge of basic weightlifting techniques like squats, deadlifts and presses. They will also increase the yields from other lifting, throwing and dragging exercises, which are so valuable to wrestlers, footballers, grapplers and mixed martial artists or anyone looking for a brutal workout. 

RAWFIT Sand Bags are made from '1000d Nylon water resistance material' and sealed with nylon stitching. The sand within is enclosed within a series of inner bags, all also made from nylon and sealed with a doubled Velcro closure to prevent leakage. Sandbag training will increase the effectiveness of a whole range of exercises.

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.

name: Power Gym Rings - FREE Delivery
description:
You can build the strength of an Olympic Gymnast with Power Rings. Gymnasts are easily pound for pound one of the strongest athletes in the world.

You’ll learn exercises like:
The ring chin up - they provide greater freedom to the shoulders and a great range of motions.
The ring dip for a powerful and strong upper body, because they create instability you have to work that extra bit.
The ring fly for uncompromised chest strength.
The unique front lever drill that will give your core stablising muscles a workout like no other.
Master your muscle-up.
And discover once and for all how to perform the awe inspiring Iron Cross like the true Olympic champions.
And many more....

What’s included in the box?
The Power Rings package comes with two super strong (indestructible) textured polycarbonate resin rings. Two equally strong nylon adjustable straps (can hold over 500kg of weight), along with 2 adjustable cam buckles. The straps have a hang length of approx. 2.4m. All you need to find is the closest tree. 

Who uses them? 
Elite athletes 
Gymnasts (of course)
Crossfitters 
DANIEL CRAIG - he incorporated ring training and is close to mastering the Crucifix. 
“300” cast members at the world famous GYM JONES gym.

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.

name: Speed Jump Ropes - FREE DELIVERY
description:
*Completely adjustable up to 270cm length.
*2.5mm thick steel wire encased in a thin layer of nylon to ensure durability. Cuts through the air more quickly, ensuring maximum speed.
*Two comfortable handles with ball bearing attachment for smooth and consistent "turn-over"

Why add Jump Rope training? 

Because ten minutes of skipping is the equivalent of running a four minute mile. It's a tough workout! Typically, a few minutes skipping is enough to get the heart pumping. 

This is how to build the heart and lungs of an elite athlete. 

Bottom line? 

Speed rope skipping gives you a killer workout. Plus you get an endurance workout, mixed in with a coordination element and agility work with your feet.

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.

name: Cast Iron Russian Kettlebell 4kg - 44kg - FREE Delivery
description:
RAWFIT Classic Design: Classic design kettlebells are the perfect choice if you're just starting out. A short and sharp kettlebell workout will train your entire body including your core, back and hips. 

-Weight 4kg - 44kg. 
-Custom textured finish that provides superior grip without hurting your hands. Mad with Iron and Proxy Coat finish.  
-Wide handle that fits two hands well for kettlebell swings.
-Perfect handle thickness for grip strength. It does increase with weight.
-Tough, durable finish that takes abuse.
-Well-designed bell shape that sits perfectly in the rack & at the top of a snatch.
-Accurate weights in kilograms.
-Completely flat bottoms for renegade rows, handstands + more!

Legend has it Kettlebells were originally used as a counterweight for weighing grain on a balance beam at markets in China and Russia, someone began swinging them around and discovered they provided a grueling combined strength and cardio workout like no other. However the Scottish also have put claims to Kettlebells as they have been used in Highlands games for centuries. Wherever they came from one this is for sure they will challenge you. 

Over time, in Russian the military understood its potential and started to use it, then Russian strongmen, weightlifters and wrestlers. American athletes eventually discovered it in the recent times. Today it is regarded by fitness experts as the ultimate training tool for all-round fitness and physical development. It was popularised in the west by likes of Pavel Tsatsouline, Steve Maxwell, Steve Cotter and Mike Mahler. 

The Kettlebell is distinguished from all other resistance training implements by its displaced center of mass. Most resistance training equipment has a central point of balance at equal distance from its extremities (like the barbell or dumbbell). With a Kettlebell, the center of mass is located somewhere in the sphere, some distance from the handle. This imbues the bell with what often feels like a mind of its own.

The ‘Classic’ Kettlebell is so-named because it is the original shape of the Russian bell. The classic shape is well suited to the smaller athlete; the sphere is smaller and makes it easier to use, especially for activities involving two bells, like swings. They are also easier to store as they don’t take up as much space as their Pro Grade cousins.

Kettlebell have quickly become a favorite for mixed martial artist,  rugby players and other top athletes who need explosive power and additional brute strength and overall cardiovascular fitness. Kettlebells take no prisoners. 

Kettlebells deliver STRENGTH, ENDURANCE and RAPID WEIGHT LOSS without the DISHONOUR of aerobics and dieting.

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over  water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.

name: Indian Iron Clubbells 8kg - 15kg - FREE DELIVERY
description:
Indian Iron Clubbells￼ - Sold as Single

Weight 8kg, 10kg, 12kg & 15kg

Looking to expand upon your exercise routine with a unique workout used by martial arts and military fitness experts to world over? Indian Iron Clubbells are great circular strength training tools. This form of training was originally used for centuries by Indians and Iranians elite warriors, and wrestlers as a method for building strength while maintaining flexibility, this modern version is no exception. The Iron Clubbells workout will definitely challenge you to test your limits.

What Iron Clubbells Will Do For You.....
-Develops shoulder strength, endurance and flexibility through
  extreme ranges of motion.
-Vastly improve your grip and wrist strength.
-Train dynamic shoulder flexibility and stability.
-Improve timing and coordination.
-Develop tremendous rotator cuff strength.
-Great for sports like golf, tennis, swimming, cricket, baseball,    
  badminton , squash, wrestling and martial arts.

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.

name: Power Weighted Vest 20kg & 30kg - FREE delivery
description:
The Power Weighted Vest will help you:

•    Increase the workload of your training session
•    Burn more calories- lose weight
•    Increase metabolic rate
•    Improve muscle and bone density
•    Increase muscle strength and endurance
•    Take your kettlebell training to a whole new level
•    Increase the demand on body weight exercises

The Power Vest is ideal for men and women who have mastered training with their body weight and would like to add that extra resistance. Great for calisthenics and kettlebell exercises.  The load is evenly distributed across a larger surface area (your torso), keeping the load proximal to your core, which minimizes stress on the joints while still providing substantial fitness gains. Take it off and all of a sudden everything becomes easier! 

By wearing the Power Vest your muscles are forced to work harder for the duration of your workout. Research shows that up to 40% more calories are burned than in a normal session.

The Power Vest is the most comfortable and easiest way to load up your workout. The weighted Power Vest loads your body without impeding your workout. 

NB. two slightly different designs.

name: 10kg Power Weighted Vest - FREE DELIVERY
description:
The Power Weighted Vest will help you:

•    Increase the workload of your training session

The Power Vest is ideal for men and women who have mastered training with their body weight and would like to add that extra resistance. Great for calisthenics and kettlebell exercises.  The load is evenly distributed across a larger surface area (your torso), keeping the load proximal to your core, which minimizes stress on the joints while still providing substantial fitness gains. Take it off and all of a sudden everything becomes easier! 

By wearing the Power Vest your muscles are forced to work harder for the duration of your workout. Research shows that up to 40% more calories are burned than in a normal session.

The Power Vest weighs in at 10kg when fully loaded with 20 x 0.5kg steel bars. This enables you to deload the vest at 0.5kg increments to your desired weight. The Power Vest is suitable for all fitness levels and is adjustable to all body types and sizes.

The Power Vest is the most comfortable and easiest way to load up your workout. The weighted Power Vest loads your body without impeding your workout.

name: Heavy Grip - FREE DELIVERY
description:
AUTHENTIC, ORIGINAL, UNMATCHED 

If you've got the hand strength, we've got the grippers for you to prove it. And if you don't yet have the hand strength you want, we have the grippers that will help you develop it. They are one the finest, toughest grippers on the planet.

Available in seven strengths for a perfect fit, each level reflects the precision, durability, and beauty of an authentic Heavy Grip:
Beginner 100 lb For warm up, weekend warriors and those new to grip strength. 
Intermediate 150 lb. This is the bridge gripper taking you from ordinary to unusual levels of grip strength
Advanced 200 lb. Those folks who have been lifting weights for a number of years will find this challenging but a great start. 
Professional 250 lb. - Close this gripper and you’ve got an extremely strong hand.
Gripper King 300 lb. - The most sought-after honor in the grip world. 	
Grip Monster 350 lb. - This is bridging the gap between 300 lb. and 400 lb. 
God like Strength 400 lb. - You have Herculean Strength when you close this one. Hailed as the ultimate feat of (crushing) grip strength; if you can close this gripper. Close this and you are going to have the every bragging rights in the grip world. 


If you're brand new to grip training best you start with the 100 lb.. We suggest that if you've never trained your crushing grip specifically, it's best to start with the 150 lb.. If you've been training with weights for number of years or regularly used grippers of some sort of hand strength, then start with a 200 lb.. Very rarely will somebody close a 200 lb. the first time they try it.

The Heavy Gripper is perfect for anyone wanting to improve their crushing grip strength. 
Rock Climbers
MMA Fighters
Wrestlers 
Brazilian Ju-Jitsu 
Rugby Players 
Any Combat Sport Athlete 

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.

name: 8kg Competition Russian Kettlebell - FREE DELIVERY
description:
Competition Russian Kettlebell 8kg. 
Professional Grade Kettlebells.....the world standard in kettlebells. 

Originally designed by Russia's leading kettlebells lifters and coaches, these kettlebells are optimally ergonomically designed for kettlebell lifting and sports. 

The professional grade kettlebells are used by professional kettlebells athletes world wide in all international kettlebell competitions. 

The benefits include:

Consistent dimensions throughout the range 12, 16, 20, 24, 28, 32, 36, 40& 48kg, therefore there is no need to change technique when moving between weights.

Made from steel, making them virtually indestructible

Ergonomically designed for Girevoy Sport (the sport of kettlebell lifting)

Narrower handle, therefore no lateral slipping.

Thinner handle making the grip less of an issue in high rep snatch sets. The unique design means that our bells fit comfortably on the forearm and minimise impact. This is helped by using a large diameter bell that increases surface area on the forearm and reduces impact.

Better ballistic properties due to more mass in the 'ball' of the kettlebell.

Large stable base - suitable for all drills - eg renegade rows - bear walks etc. THESE BELLS DO NOT HAVE UNSTABLE RUBBER FEET.

Check out our site for great kettlebells and strength & conditioning exercises programme, www.rawfit.co.uk 

NB. FREE DELIVERY IS ONLY FOR MAINLAND UK ONLY. Any address where it has to be delivered over water or by air (e.g., Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isle of Wight, Europe) will incur delivery charges.
